Name: zho-anonymousgroupo-lad
Author: Anonymous Group Of Translators
Source: Goodword Books , http://www.goodwordbooks.com/ , Center for Peace and Spirituality , https://www.cpsglobal.org/

Translations.Text: Zhēnzhǔ què shì shǐ gǔ lì hé guǒ hé zhànkāi de, tā cóng wú shēngwù zhòng zào chū shēngwù, cóng shēngwù zhòng zào chū wú shēngwù. Zhè shì zhēnzhǔ, nǐmen zěnme néng bèimiù ne
Tā shǐ tiān pòxiǎo, tā yǐ yèjiān gōng rén ānxí, yǐ rì yuè gōng rén jìshí. Zhè shì wànnéng zhě quán zhì zhě de bùzhì
Tā wèi nǐmen chuàngzào zhū xīng, yǐbiàn nǐmen zài lùdì hé hǎiyáng de chóngchóng hēi'àn lǐ jiè zhū xīng ér zūnxún zhèngdào. Wǒ wèi yǒu zhīshì de mínzhòng què yǐ jiěshì yī qiē jīxiàngle
Tā cóng yīgè rén chuàngzào nǐmen, ránhòu, nǐmen yǒu zhùsù dì dìfāng, yǒu jìcún dì dìfāng, wǒ yǐ wéi néng liǎojiě de mínzhòng jiěshìle yī qiē jīxiàng

Tā cóng yún zhōng jiàngxià yǔshuǐ, yòng yǔshuǐ shǐ yīqiè zhíwù fāyá, zhǎng chū cuìlǜ de zhīyè, jié chū lěilěi de guǒshí, cóng hǎi zǎo shù de huā bèi zhōng jié chū yī chuàn chuàn zǎo qiú;(yòng yǔshuǐ jiāoguàn) xǔduō pútáo yuán,(jiāoguàn) xiāngsì de hé bù xiāngsì de zǐ dūn hé shíliú. Dāng guǒshù jiéguǒ de shíhòu, nǐmen kàn kàn nàxiē guǒshí hé chéngshú de qíngxíng ba. Duìyú xìndào de mínzhòng, cǐ zhōng què yǒu xǔduō jīxiàng
Zhēnzhǔ chuàngzào jīnglíng, ér tāmen yǐ jīnglíng wéi zhēnzhǔ de huǒbàn, bìngqiě wúzhī dì tì tā niēzào xǔduō érnǚ. Zànsòng zhēnzhǔ, chāojué wànwù, tā shì chāo hū tāmen de xùshù de
Tā shì tiāndì de chuàngzào zhě, tā méiyǒu pèi'ǒu, zěnme huì yǒu érnǚ ne? Tā céng chuàngzào wànwù, tā shì quánzhī wànwù de
